laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial biopsy demonstrated a nonspecific lichenoid dermatitis; repeat biopsy showed epidermal hyperplasia with a moderate degree of cellular atypia.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressed to widespread erythematous, scaly patches and a later biopsy revealed loss of orderly epithelial architecture with full-thickness, severe cytologic atypia characteristic of squamous cell carcinoma in situ.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Several biopsy specimens from involved skin sites revealed normal epidermis.
